data.persona: Why are all the male two-legs leaving? Should I stay and eat the meat scraps the females will leave me or go with the males? I have heard the wolves and smelled them too. They're out there.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, a magical lights, a tome, a painting, a flask, and a scroll here.
The a baby dragon and the roach are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the magical lights so I can retrieve them for my master, the tallest two-legs.
data.mid_motivation: I need to retrieve them. and bring them to him, because I always do as my master commands.
data.long_motivation: I always do as my master commands because I've been well trained for life, and want to keep serving the master forever in exchange for rubs of his hand and scraps from his table.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Large Chunk of Meat and Bone from Master
